name: Swapper (Jayanthvoyager)
description:
Spawner is an isometric Shooting/Arcade/Survival/Action game where the player should make the character collect yellow spheres by solving puzzles. The levels could be solved by creating clones and making them move with the character to open doors. In this game shooting the clone will make the character teleport to their positions. This game has a different mechanism which will make the players engaged throughout the game.

CONTROLS:

w, a, s, d = move player

Left mouse button - Create Clones to teleport.

Right mouse button - Shoot clones to teleport.

Game submitted for Mix and Jam 2020.

Theme: Mixing Geners. (Isometric Shooting/Arcade/Survival/Action)
